statements: SELECT * FROM WearableDeviceData WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM WearableDeviceData WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, activity_level FROM WearableDeviceData WHERE heart_rate > 120 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM WearableDeviceData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature, activity_level FROM WearableDeviceData WHERE patient_id IN (54321, 67890);
SELECT * FROM WearableDeviceData WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM WearableDeviceData WHERE activity_level > 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature, timestamp FROM WearableDeviceData WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND temperature < 98.6 ORDER BY patient_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM WearableDeviceData GROUP BY patient_id HAVING avg_heart_rate > 70
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS data_points_count FROM WearableDeviceData GROUP BY patient_id HAVING data_points_count > 20 ORDER BY data_points_count DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT patient_id, sensor_id, data_time, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, data_time FROM sensor_data ORDER BY data_time DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_info ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY data_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(sensor_value), MAX(sensor_value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(age) FROM patient_info GROUP BY patient_name HAVING AVG(age) > 30;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data JOIN patient_info ON sensor_data.patient_id = patient_info.patient_id WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_type, heart_rate FROM wearable_devices WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 98.6 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_type, heart_rate FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'Fitbit' ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(heart_rate) > 80;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM Patient WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Sensor WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM Sensor INNER JOIN Patient ON Sensor.patient_id = Patient.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM Sensor WHERE patient_id = 3 AND sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT MAX(value), MIN(value) FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM Patient p JOIN Alert a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.severity = 'high' ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_alerts FROM Patient p JOIN Alert a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_alerts > 5 ORDER BY num_alerts DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT data_id, timestamp, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM sensor_data WHERE heart_rate > 100
SELECT patient_id, alert_type, time_issued FROM alerts ORDER BY time_issued ASC
SELECT physician_name, specialization, department FROM physicians
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM sensor_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Sony' LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients INNER JOIN sensor_data ON patients.patient_id = sensor_data.patient_id WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patients JOIN sensor_data ON patients.patient_id = sensor_data.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 120 AND blood_pressure='Normal'
SELECT physician_name, specialization, department FROM physicians WHERE department LIKE '%Cardiology%' ORDER BY physician_name ASC
